description: It provides a warm glow around you.
It allows you to open locked doors.
It allows you to swim in water.
It protects you from poisonous swamp gasses.
It allows you to see invisible creatures.
It allows you to dig through some walls.
It protects you from the radiant heat of volcanos.
It allows you to see hidden traps.
It is a pewter statue of a cat.
It shows a map of the world (press M).
It is a silver key with a shimmering jewel etched in the shape of a spiral.
It increases the number of items you can hold in a slot.
It casts a bright magical light, piercing the darkness around you.
It sparkles with an amethyst hue, offering defense against all magic attacks for pets.
